title: How to Make Pancake Cupcakes

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 400° Fahrenheit (204° Celsius).
Spray a cupcake with non-stick greasing spray.
In a large bowl, whisk the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Combine the flour, sugar, salt, and baking until properly mixed.

steps.headline: In a separate bowl, beat the wet ingredients.
steps.description: Whisk the eggs, butter, and milk until well-combined.

steps.headline: Pour the wet ingredients in with the dry and whisk until well-mixed.
Scoop the cupcake batter in the cupcake tray.
Bake the cupcakes for about 10 minutes, barely getting brown and baking thoroughly.
Allow the cupcakes to cool on a wire rack for about 5 minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Top the cupcakes with bacon frosting, vanilla frosting, or chocolate frosting. Garnish with any desired toppings. Enjoy!

text: Preheat the oven to 400° Fahrenheit (204° Celsius).  Spray a cupcake with non-stick greasing spray.  In a large bowl, whisk the dry ingredients. Combine the flour, sugar, salt, and baking until properly mixed. In a separate bowl, beat the wet ingredients. Whisk the eggs, butter, and milk until well-combined. Pour the wet ingredients in with the dry and whisk until well-mixed. There will be some lumps. Scoop the cupcake batter in the cupcake tray.  Bake the cupcakes for about 10 minutes, barely getting brown and baking thoroughly.  Allow the cupcakes to cool on a wire rack for about 5 minutes.  Serve. Top the cupcakes with bacon frosting, vanilla frosting, or chocolate frosting. Garnish with any desired toppings. Enjoy!
